FuncDef: This command configures the reference bandwidth that provides the basis of bandwidth relative costing.

ParaDef.Info: The reference bandwidth in kilobits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 4000000000.
The reference bandwidth in terabits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 4.
The reference bandwidth in gigabits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 999.
The reference bandwidth in megabits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 999.
reference bandwidth in kilobits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 999.
